hi.

Does anybody have any experience in crawling OAI-PMH harvesting with h=
eritrix. 

With a standard XMLExtractor the link-extraction works very fine=
 - the biggest issue seems to be to extract URLs when crawling OAI-targest =
that uses paging. 
Paging in OAI-PMH works by a so called "resumptionToken"=
 that is given by page-1. With this resumptionToken you can construct the U=
RL for page-2 and so forth.

I would imagine it requires some scripting to =
build a simple Extractor that generates the next URL - but if somebody alre=
ady did this we won't waste time by writing it again

best
Bjarne Andersen
=
Netarchive.dk
